title: Google to ban cryptocurrency ads
text:
Google to ban cryptocurrency ads 11:04pm IST - 01:38 
Alphabet Inc's Google has announced it will ban advertisements for cryptocurrencies and related content starting in June. As Ivor Bennett reports, it comes as a calls for a global regulatory crackdown on cryptocurrencies increase. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Alphabet Inc's Google has announced it will ban advertisements for cryptocurrencies and related content starting in June. As Ivor Bennett reports, it comes as a calls for a global regulatory crackdown on cryptocurrencies increase. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pe5NVo
